name: Stephanie Long
text: This place is amazing. Their customer service is above and beyond. The pizza and cheesy bread were both loaded and the service was quick. This will be our go to pizza place from now on! Definitely would recommend to anyone in the area needing a quick delicious dinner.

name: Laurie Ringler
text: Pizza Pro is so tasty! Fresh and hot and somehow with tons of toppings, the crust hold up! Highly recommend!

name: Laura Abbott
text: Great food. Great drive thru service !

name: Bob
text: The worse pizza I ever got there$40 for pizza that was so bad and the bread was under cooked

name: Bettina Timm
text: We love Pizza Pro Pizza! Great food and wonderful staff!

name: Caleb Trachte
text: Been here twice: once a year ago and our pizza experience was so much different than everyone else's, was sad-looking and almost $20. Second time we came in we were greeted with hostility because it was a holiday. Not interested in coming back to be honest, many other pizza options in Cabot.

name: Rhonda Gibson
text: Hands down the best Pizza in Cabot. Their service is personable and efficient. Love the owners always kind and looking to help. Great Pizza and Great Service!

name: nonya biz
text: Ive been going here for a long time and I never had a bad pizza from this joint.  Very good affordable pizzas and the staff there are great!  What makes a good pizza joint better than others?  Its all about whos there working on your pizza!  I have nothing but good things to say about this particular Pizza Pro location.

name: Lazy Trucker
text: I love calzones. This was so delicious I had to force myself to stop eating. Very friendly staff if Im in town I will stopping by again.

name: Jack Spoon
text: We loved the pizza, , supreme add Italian  sausage. Best pizza ever..

name: Randy Tomboli
text: Great pizza and customer service...

name: Brad Smith
text: Usually great pizza (95% average) just dont go when busy. Kinda $$$ compared to others.

name: Eddith Garza
text: Best pizza in Little Rock! So glad we gave this place a chance.

name: Jessica Taylor
text: I absolutely look forward to ordering food from here!! Every time I place an order not only is the food above and beyond but the service is as well! They have the most AMAZING salad I've ever had!! I've spoke with Johnny ( the owner ) on my ‚Ä¶More

name: Brent Haywood
text: Product always consistently good and service is always pleasant and friendly. If anything goes wrong they make it right. My kids would make the cheese sticks a food group if possible.

name: Kristen Brewis
text:
I had some issues with a bitesquad order that I couldn't get sorted out. The company helped me quickly and easily :)
Also, best salads ever.

name: Beverly Weber
text: Awesome pizza! The best!

name: Earnest McEntire
text: Great pizza, loaded with HOT, FRESH toppings, oowey gooey CHEESE.... Oh my.  Drive through was fast and easy.

name: Chris Hogan
text: Fast and great service! And the food is good too.

name: Ken Pasley
text: Pizza was great and the Manager/Owner was wonderful!  This place has great business.  Workers were moving fast!

name: Brandy Huffman
text: Awesome service! This was our first time here since the new ownership. There was a miscommunication and they were quick to fix it and with a smile. We will definitely be back! Very nice staff.

name: Trey Smith
text: I just ordered easily the worst chicken wings I've ever had. They're bulky and appear worth the price because they are covered in fat. The awful frozen ones you buy at Walmart have less fat on them. I will not be going back to pizza pro if ‚Ä¶More

name: Ginger Simmons
text: The have the best pizza and cheese sticks with great affordable prices.

name: Doug Blanford
text:
Hometown boy does good! Locally family owned and it sure shows! Military discounts, teacher discounts, and when the community calls he answers big time!
The 5 pound pizza is just that, and the portions on everything else is excellent! Dump the chain places and GO LOCAL!

name: Gloria Marquez
text: Pizza pro is the best if you haven't had there pizza in a while, try it there's a new owner and it's not even in comparison to the last one, it's the Best

text: Awesome pizza.  New owner...new attitude...insanely good.  They pay attention to details.  We don‚Äôt go anywhere else.

name: Robin Carlton
text: Pizza Pro makes some of the best pizza I have eaten.  Their prices are pretty good for awesome pizza! The workers there are usually very busy but still treat u respectfully!

name: Daniel Jackson
text: Ordered pizza and cheese sticks on a Sunday when our favorite pizza place was closed. They told us several different Prices... They ended up overcharging us. When we asked for a receipt they told us the tickets on the box was the receipt. ‚Ä¶More

name: Eric Parker
text: Very good pizza, fresh and hot not greasy. Pizza was cooked to perfection. Very nice people.

name: Patricia Pollack
text: Pizza Pro in Cabot is great.  I ordered pizzas for the AFROTC cadets at Cabot High School.  Not only were the pizzas hot and ready for pick up when I arrived, but John (the owner) loaned me the heated delivery boxes, then showed me the way ‚Ä¶More

name: Denise Highfill
text: This place is definitely not the Pizza Pro that it used to be by no means. The pizza WAS NOT good, nor did it even look good. And they can't cut equally portioned slices. I mean 8 slices of pizza and they 8 different sizes. Oh but they did ‚Ä¶More

name: Christy Stafford
text: Pizza pro is what I grew up on, over the years I had been missing the taste of the first slice ...but now finally the new owners, they have taking it back to what it use to be!! You won't have another pizza like it around!! Also you should try out the 5lbs pizza , enough to share with some friends !!
